title: Cant login, get stuck on authenticating
body: Not sure what happened but i was playing last night and everything was fine. I get up this morning and i cant seem to login and i have attempted the recommended suggestions from riot. Anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
I'm seeing a lot of posts around the boards today about some possible login server issues that happened about 3 hours ago. From most of the replies however, it does seem like everyone has been able to get back in. 

Hit me back in a reply if you're still stuck at authenticating though!!

Still stuck, can't connect, my internet is decently fast at 50 mbps, i went through security check, firewall check, re-installing to no avail, im hoping there'll be a hotfix about this problem soon! in the meantime i'll go get some aiiir
